para.text: A few years ago I was working on a project where we are working on add ins for Office365. These add ins must be tested when they where ready.
For this all the tests where created with Visual Studio with using Selenium. That was working fine. But there are some little issues to work with that:

li.text: You need developer experience to use this
It is a labor-intensive process to create test scenarios
Visual Studio is needed to create and update the tests

para.text: With this solution everybody can create, updating and executing test scenarios for web sites.
So, hopefully the user likes this application.
